us.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

► 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action.

► 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own.


Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease.

Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.


Features:

● 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad.
● Compatible with MFi controllers.
● Game Center achievements.
● Haptic Vibration.
● From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated.
● Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare.
● Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound.
● Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace.
● All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

us.description:
A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery?

Use wit, curiosity and lateral thinking to puzzle your way towards a solution, helped by the local citizens you meet along the way. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip. 

Follow the Meaning is a surreal, hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure inspired by classic titles like Samorost and the Rusty Lake series.  

Features

■ Hand-drawn art brings the offbeat world to life
■ Whimsical worldbuilding with a sinister undertone
■ Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar
■ A twisted mystery that awaits your diligent inspection
■ 1.5 hours average playtime

us.releaseNotes:
This update changes the behaviour of the loop button, making it consistent for single song and Setlist playback.  The loop button now has three modes:

* OFF: Plays a song from beginning to end. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically start the next song when the end of the current song is reached.
* LOOP: Plays between the start and end markers continuously in a loop.
* SECTION: Plays between the start and end markers once. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically move on to the next song when the end marker is reached.

us.description:
-- From the makers of the award-winning Just Press Record! --

Calling all music, dance and fitness enthusiasts… and absolutely anyone who wants to change the tempo of their favourite songs without affecting pitch or fidelity!

Perfect Tempo is the only app you’ll ever need to speed up or slow down over 100 million songs on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app. 

Create unlimited playlists and, if you have an Apple Watch, control playback from your wrist for the ultimate convenience!

Perfect!!


PICK ANY SONG
• Change the tempo of any song on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app without affecting pitch or fidelity
• Access the entire Apple Music catalog of over 100 million songs!
• Play tracks from Cloud Drive, Dropbox and other cloud services
• Quick access to your recently played songs

ADJUST THE TEMPO
• A simple slider for adjusting tempo
• Select any tempo from -50% to +100%, in 1% increments
• Easily revert to the original tempo with just one tap
• App will remember your chosen tempo until you want to adjust it again

CREATE SETLISTS
• Create unlimited Setlists
• Name your Setlists to find them easily later
• Continuous play from one song to the next
• Set and remember different tempos for different songs
• Combine songs from Apple Music, your Music app and Files app all in the same Setlist
• Create Setlists from existing albums and playlists in your Music app or on Apple Music

REPEAT JUST ONE SECTION
• Select and change the tempo of just one section of a song and then loop it to make practise easy
• Add sections of a song to a Setlist multiple times and then play them back at different tempos

APPLE WATCH
• Easily control playback, tempo and volume from your wrist

AIRPLAY
• AirPlay support for output to wireless speakers or Apple TV

AND MORE
• Support for Dark Mode
• Change the key (transpose up or down) of locally stored DRM-free songs imported into the app or from your Music app.  (Missing the pitch controls from the last version? Re-enable them in the Settings app > Perfect Tempo. Then swipe left on the album artwork when playing a song)


IMPORTANT!

* Songs from streaming services other than Apple Music are not supported *

us.description:
Just Press Record is the ultimate audio recorder bringing one tap recording, transcription and iCloud syncing to all your devices. You can edit your audio and transcriptions right inside the app and even start a new recording completely hands-free with Siri!

Life is full of moments we would rather not forget - like your child’s first words, an important meeting or spontaneous idea. Capture these moments effortlessly on iPhone, iPad, Mac or for ultimate convenience, Apple Watch.

RECORD
• One tap to start, stop, pause and resume recording.
• Start and stop recording from the Lock Screen, Control Centre, the Action Button, Shortcuts, Siri, the Widget, a 3D Touch Quick Action or via the URL scheme.
• Unlimited recording time.
• Record discretely in the background.
• Choose to record from the built-in mic, AirPods or external microphones.
• Record independently on Apple Watch and sync later.

PLAY
• Seek backwards and forwards during playback.
• Adjustable playback speed.

TRANSCRIBE
• Turn speech into searchable text.
• Support for over 30 languages, independent of your device's language setting.
• Synchronized text highlighting and audio playback.
• Format as you record with punctuation commands.

EDIT
• Audio - visualise your audio in the waveform view and cut out the parts you don’t need.
• Text - make corrections and add new text to your transcriptions.

SHARE
• Share audio and text to other apps.
• Share easily to social media as a video clip.
• Share to iTunes on Mac or PC via USB cable.
• Print a hard copy of your transcripts.
• Share audio files from other apps to Just Press Record. 

ORGANISATION
• View recent recordings or browse your library by date and time.
• Search by filename or transcription content.
• Dedicated tab for quick access to recordings made on Apple Watch.
• Rename recordings.
• Slide Over and Split View support on iPad.
• Add a badge to the app icon showing the number of unplayed recordings.

STORAGE
• Choose to store recordings in iCloud Drive or locally on-device.
• Recordings stored in iCloud Drive automatically sync across all your devices.
• Recordings stored locally benefit from Files app integration and automatic iTunes File Sharing.
• Transcriptions are stored within the audio file.

PRO-AUDIO
• Support for stereo recording from the built-in microphone on supported devices.
• Support for high quality external microphones connected via the Lightning Port.
• Customisable Audio Settings to enhance your recording experience.
• File types include WAV, AIF or standard iTunes M4A (ACC).
• High quality audio up to 96kHz / 24-bit.

ACCESSIBILITY
• VoiceOver support throughout the app.
• Magic Tap gesture to start / stop a recording.

APPLE WATCH
Just Press Record includes an Apple Watch app that gives you the freedom to record anywhere, even when your iPhone is not around.

• Start recording with a single tap on the Complication.
• Record discretely in the background.
• Unlimited recording time.
• Recordings automatically transfer to iPhone for transcription and iCloud syncing.
• Listen to recent recordings through the built-in speaker or AirPods.
• Adjust volume with the Digital Crown.
• Pause recording with a downward swipe.
• Accessibility support with VoiceOver, reduced motion and support for the extra large Complication template.

IMPORTANT:
• Just Press Record does not record phone calls or audio from other apps.
• Transcription requires a good, clean audio signal.  Avoid recording in noisy environments and ensure the microphone is positioned close to the source.
• URL scheme implemented by Just Press Record can be found on our FAQ page.

Awards:

● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tr.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, tweaks, and statistics sync automatically. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere.

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

In the distant "Planet", planets burst and civilizations collapse.
The residents who lost their "Home" wander above within The Ring.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

DUST EFFECT

LIGHT LEAKS

BOKEH EFFECT

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

tr.description:
“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

tr.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

► 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action.

► 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own.


Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease.

Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.


Features:

● 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad.
● Compatible with MFi controllers.
● Game Center achievements.
● Haptic Vibration.
● From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated.
● Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare.
● Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound.
● Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace.
● All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

This update changes the behaviour of the loop button, making it consistent for single song and Setlist playback.  The loop button now has three modes:

* OFF: Plays a song from beginning to end. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically start the next song when the end of the current song is reached.
* LOOP: Plays between the start and end markers continuously in a loop.
* SECTION: Plays between the start and end markers once. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically move on to the next song when the end marker is reached.

tr.description:
Just Press Record is the ultimate audio recorder bringing one tap recording, transcription and iCloud syncing to all your devices. You can edit your audio and transcriptions right inside the app and even start a new recording completely hands-free with Siri!

Life is full of moments we would rather not forget - like your child’s first words, an important meeting or spontaneous idea. Capture these moments effortlessly on iPhone, iPad, Mac or for ultimate convenience, Apple Watch.

RECORD
• One tap to start, stop, pause and resume recording.
• Start and stop recording from the Lock Screen, Control Centre, the Action Button, Shortcuts, Siri, the Widget, a 3D Touch Quick Action or via the URL scheme.
• Unlimited recording time.
• Record discretely in the background.
• Choose to record from the built-in mic, AirPods or external microphones.
• Record independently on Apple Watch and sync later.

PLAY
• Seek backwards and forwards during playback.
• Adjustable playback speed.

TRANSCRIBE
• Turn speech into searchable text.
• Support for over 30 languages, independent of your device's language setting.
• Synchronized text highlighting and audio playback.
• Format as you record with punctuation commands.

EDIT
• Audio - visualise your audio in the waveform view and cut out the parts you don’t need.
• Text - make corrections and add new text to your transcriptions.

SHARE
• Share audio and text to other apps.
• Share easily to social media as a video clip.
• Share to iTunes on Mac or PC via USB cable.
• Print a hard copy of your transcripts.
• Share audio files from other apps to Just Press Record. 

ORGANISATION
• View recent recordings or browse your library by date and time.
• Search by filename or transcription content.
• Dedicated tab for quick access to recordings made on Apple Watch.
• Rename recordings.
• Slide Over and Split View support on iPad.
• Add a badge to the app icon showing the number of unplayed recordings.

STORAGE
• Choose to store recordings in iCloud Drive or locally on-device.
• Recordings stored in iCloud Drive automatically sync across all your devices.
• Recordings stored locally benefit from Files app integration and automatic iTunes File Sharing.
• Transcriptions are stored within the audio file.

PRO-AUDIO
• Support for stereo recording from the built-in microphone on supported devices.
• Support for high quality external microphones connected via the Lightning Port.
• Customisable Audio Settings to enhance your recording experience.
• File types include WAV, AIF or standard iTunes M4A (ACC).
• High quality audio up to 96kHz / 24-bit.

ACCESSIBILITY
• VoiceOver support throughout the app.
• Magic Tap gesture to start / stop a recording.

APPLE WATCH
Just Press Record includes an Apple Watch app that gives you the freedom to record anywhere, even when your iPhone is not around.

• Start recording with a single tap on the Complication.
• Record discretely in the background.
• Unlimited recording time.
• Recordings automatically transfer to iPhone for transcription and iCloud syncing.
• Listen to recent recordings through the built-in speaker or AirPods.
• Adjust volume with the Digital Crown.
• Pause recording with a downward swipe.
• Accessibility support with VoiceOver, reduced motion and support for the extra large Complication template.

IMPORTANT:
• Just Press Record does not record phone calls or audio from other apps.
• Transcription requires a good, clean audio signal.  Avoid recording in noisy environments and ensure the microphone is positioned close to the source.
• URL scheme implemented by Just Press Record can be found on our FAQ page.

tr.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

tr.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

pt.description:
Eco Inc. Salve a Terra — sandbox de estratégia no gênero “Incs” dos criadores de Religion Inc.

Eco Inc. desafia você com uma variedade de cenários ambientais — de fáceis a quase impossíveis.
Sua missão é estabilizar os ecossistemas da Terra e melhorar a situação ambiental do planeta.
Cada ação importa — suas decisões moldam o futuro do planeta. Sua preocupação leva a Terra rumo à harmonia e ao desenvolvimento sustentável.

Recursos do jogo:
• Desenvolva iniciativas ambientais
• Descubra animais da Lista Vermelha da IUCN
• Mecânicas de jogo diversificadas: gestão de recursos, diplomacia
• Tarefas desafiadoras e eventos inesperados que testarão suas habilidades estratégicas
• Contribua de verdade para salvar o planeta promovendo a conscientização ecológica
• Não deixe um desastre ecológico se espalhar pelo mundo como uma praga
• Planejamento estratégico: crie planos de longo prazo
• Voluntariado: envie seus heróis para ajudar, participe de projetos internacionais
• Desenvolvimento econômico: gerencie recursos, invista em novas tecnologias e construa um futuro verde

As informações do jogo são baseadas em dados abertos, na Lista Vermelha da IUCN e em comunidades ecológicas globais.

Temos grandes planos para futuras atualizações!
Compartilhe suas ideias e feedback nos comentários — junto com o GameFirst, faremos o jogo ainda melhor!

pt.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, tweaks, and statistics sync automatically. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere.

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

pt.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Thumper é violência musical: ação clássica, velocidade alucinante e fisicalidade brutal. Você é um besouro espacial que deve desbravar o vazio e enfrentar uma cabeça gigante desvairada.

Com esta edição especial de bolso, jogue todas as nove fases épicas com apenas uma mão.

Avance, domine novos movimentos e sobreviva a terríveis batalhas de chefões, tudo movido a uma pulsante trilha sonora original, que fará você sentir cada impacto esmagador. Para atingir o paraíso da sinestesia, você terá que conquistar o inferno do ritmo.

■ Características ■

・ Controles perfeitos de um toque
・ 60 FPS tanto no modo retrato quanto no paisagem
・ Nove fases incríveis
・ Batalhas alucinantes contra chefões
・ Visuais psicodélicos e uma trilha sonora original

Fones sem fio podem causar uma latência perceptível no áudio. Para a melhor experiência, recomendamos enfaticamente o uso de alto-falantes integrados ou fones com fio.

“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

pt.description:
Finalmente, o premiado slash-'em-up da Heart Machine chega ao iOS na sua versão mais polida e refinada de sempre, a Special Edition.


► Vencedor dos prémios "Audience Award" e "Excellence in Visual Art" do prestigiado Independent Games Festival.

► Mais de 14 nomeações nas categorias Melhor Design Visual, Melhor Áudio e Melhor Jogo Original.

► 9/10 Destructoid « Um exemplo de excelência. Podem existir falhas, mas são insignificantes e não causam granes estragos. »

► 9,5/10 Game Informer « A combinação da banda sonora, dos gráficos e dos combates cria um ambiente complexo que vale a pena explorar. »

► Recomendado pela Eurogamer « O slash-'em-up da Heart Machine é esgotante e preciso - e incrivelmente belo. »

► 9/10 GameSpot « É mais do que simplesmente bonito; o Hyper Light Drifter usa os seus gráficos para te guiar e relaxar. As paisagens magníficas desaceleram a pulsação entre sequências de combate difíceis, que te deixam sem fôlego. »

► 8,5 Polygon « O Hyper Light Drifter combina habilmente momentos contemplativos com ação vertiginosa. »

► 5 Estrelas Darkstation « O RPG de ação, visto de cima, Hyper Light Drifter é um jogo espantoso: lindo, um mundo fascinante para explorar, controlos sem falhas, música magnífica e a confiança no jogador que o fará descobrir as coisas sozinho. »


Os ecos de um passado sombrio e violento ressoam através das terras selvagens, repletas de tesouros e sangue. Os Drifters deste mundo são os colecionadores de conhecimentos esquecidos, tecnologias perdidas e histórias desfeitas. O nosso Drifter é assombrado por uma doença insaciável, viajando pelas terras do Tempo Sepultado, na esperança de descobrir uma forma de apaziguar a doença cruel.

Hyper Light Drifter é um RPG de ação/aventura ao estilo dos melhores clássicos de 16 bits, com mecânicas modernizadas e gráficos numa escala grandiosamente superior. Explora um vasto mundo deslumbrante e em ruínas, repleto de perigos e tecnologias esquecidas.


Características:

● Jogabilidade de 120 fps no iPad Pro / 60 fps no iPhone e iPad.
● Compatível com controladores MFi.
● Conquistas no Game Center.
● Vibração táctil.
● Desde as personagens aos elementos subtis do cenário, tudo foi concebido à mão com o maior dos afetos.
● Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar; os inimigos são cruéis e numerosos, os perigos podem esmagar facilmente o teu corpo frágil e os rostos amigáveis são raros.
● Melhora as armas, aprende novas habilidades, descobre equipamentos e atravessa um mundo sombrio e detalhado onde abundam encruzilhadas e segredos.
● Banda sonora evocativa criada por Disasterpeace.
● Todo o conteúdo do jogo original + mais armas, inimigos e áreas da Special Edition.

pt.description:
Uma carta desesperada traz o detetive Paul Trilby a uma cidadezinha peculiar em uma ilha, dividida por um muro e governada por um Hospital. Cidadãos comuns são internados e voltam sem memórias. Tem uma conspiração sinistra acontecendo. Você consegue desvendar esse mistério?

Use a perspicácia, a curiosidade e o pensamento lateral para desvendar a solução, sempre com a ajuda de cidadãos locais que você encontrará no caminho. Lembre-se que sempre tem um grão de verdade nas fofocas da cidade.

Follow the Meaning é uma aventura point-and-click surreal desenhada à mão inspirada por jogos clássicos como Samorost e a série Rusty Lake.

Características

■ Desenhos feitos à mão que trazem vida a esse mundo inusitado
■ Um mundo fantástico com um lado sombrio
■ Trilha sonora atmosférica de Victor Butzelaar
■ Um mistério sinistro que aguarda a sua inspeção meticulosa
■ Duração média de 1h30

pt.description:
Just Press Record é o gravador de áudio que grava, transcreve e sincroniza com iCloud e todos os seus dispositivos, com um toque. Edite transcrições de áudio direto no aplicativo e até mesmo inicie uma nova gravação, tudo sem usar as mãos, com a Siri!

A vida é repleta de momentos memoráveis, como as primeiras palavras do seu filho, reuniões importantes ou ideias espontâneas. Capture momentos sem esforço no iPhone, no iPad e no Mac ou, para ter total praticidade, no Apple Watch.

GRAVE
• Toque para iniciar, interromper, pausar e reiniciar a gravação.
• Inicie e interrompa a gravação pelos atalhos, no Siri, no widget, ações rápidas do 3D Touch ou pelo esquema do URL.
• Tempo de gravação ilimitado.
• Grave discretamente em segundo plano.
• Grave com o microfone interno, com AirPods ou microfones externos.
• Grave independente no Apple Watch e sincronize depois.

TOQUE
• Procure para trás e à frente na reprodução.
• Velocidade de reprodução ajustável.

TRANSCREVA
• Transforme voz em texto para pesquisa.
• Compatível com 30+ idiomas em qualquer configuração de idioma do aparelho.
• Destaque de texto e reprodução de áudio sincronizados.
• Formate enquanto grava com comandos de pontuação.

EDITE
• Áudio - veja o áudio no formato de forma de onda e corte as partes de que não precisa.
• Texto - faça correções e adicione novos textos às transcrições.

COMPARTILHE
• Compartilhe áudio e texto com outros aplicativos.
• Compartilhe em redes sociais como trecho de vídeo.
• Compartilhe no iTunes, no Mac ou no PC via cabo USB.
• Imprima uma cópia das suas transcrições.
• Compartilhe arquivos de áudio de outros aplicativos com o Just Press Record. 

ORGANIZE
• Consulte gravações recentes ou da biblioteca por data e horário.
• Pesquise por nome de arquivo ou transcrição.
• Guia dedicada ao acesso rápido às gravações do Apple Watch.
• Renomeie gravações.
• Compatível com Slide Over e Split View no iPad.
• Adicione selo ao ícone do aplicativo com número de gravações não reproduzidas.

ARMAZENAMENTO
• Armazene as gravações no iCloud Drive ou no dispositivo local.
• Gravações armazenadas no iCloud Drive são sincronizadas entre dispositivos.
• As gravações armazenadas no local se beneficiam da integração do aplicativo de arquivos e do compartilhamento automático de arquivos do iTunes.
• Transcrições são armazenadas no arquivo de áudio.

ÁUDIO PRO
• Compatível com gravação estéreo a partir do microfone interno de dispositivos compatíveis.
• Compatível com microfones externos de alta qualidade pela porta Lightning.
• Configurações ajustáveis para otimizar a experiência de áudio.
• Tipos de arquivo: WAV, AIF ou iTunes M4A padrão (ACC).
• Áudio de alta qualidade, até 96 kHz/24 bits.

ACESSIBILIDADE
• Compatível com VoiceOver no aplicativo.
• Gesto Magic Tap para iniciar/interromper gravação.

APPLE WATCH
Just Press Record conta com aplicativo para Apple Watch que permite gravar em qualquer lugar, mesmo sem o iPhone disponível.

• Comece a gravar com um único toque na Complicação.
• Grave discretamente em segundo plano.
• Tempo de gravação ilimitado.
• Gravações transferidas automaticamente para iPhone para transcr/sinc no iCloud.
• Ouça as gravações recentes no alto-falante interno ou nos AirPods.
• Ajuste o volume com a Digital Crown.
• Pause a gravação deslizando para baixo.
• Recursos de acessibilidade com VoiceOver, movimento reduzido, compatibilidade com modelo extra grande de Complicação.

IMPORTANTE:
• O Just Press Record não grava chamadas telefônicas ou áudio de outros aplicativos.
• A transcrição exibe um sinal de áudio bom e claro.  Evite gravar em ambientes ruidosos e posicione o microfone próximo à fonte de som.
• Esquema de URL implementado pelo Just Press Record está na página de FAQ.

pt.releaseNotes:
This update changes the behaviour of the loop button, making it consistent for single song and Setlist playback.  The loop button now has three modes:

* OFF: Plays a song from beginning to end. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically start the next song when the end of the current song is reached.
* LOOP: Plays between the start and end markers continuously in a loop.
* SECTION: Plays between the start and end markers once. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically move on to the next song when the end marker is reached.

Perfect Tempo will never interrupt you to ask for a review - we don’t like being interrupted either! However, App Store ratings and reviews are important, so if you are enjoying Perfect Tempo and have a spare minute, we’d be delighted if you could leave a rating or review on the App Store. Thanks!
pt.description:
-- From the makers of the award-winning Just Press Record! --

Calling all music, dance and fitness enthusiasts… and absolutely anyone who wants to change the tempo of their favourite songs without affecting pitch or fidelity!

Perfect Tempo is the only app you’ll ever need to speed up or slow down over 100 million songs on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app. 

Create unlimited playlists and, if you have an Apple Watch, control playback from your wrist for the ultimate convenience!

Perfect!!


PICK ANY SONG
• Change the tempo of any song on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app without affecting pitch or fidelity
• Access the entire Apple Music catalog of over 100 million songs!
• Play tracks from Cloud Drive, Dropbox and other cloud services
• Quick access to your recently played songs

ADJUST THE TEMPO
• A simple slider for adjusting tempo
• Select any tempo from -50% to +100%, in 1% increments
• Easily revert to the original tempo with just one tap
• App will remember your chosen tempo until you want to adjust it again

CREATE SETLISTS
• Create unlimited Setlists
• Name your Setlists to find them easily later
• Continuous play from one song to the next
• Set and remember different tempos for different songs
• Combine songs from Apple Music, your Music app and Files app all in the same Setlist
• Create Setlists from existing albums and playlists in your Music app or on Apple Music

REPEAT JUST ONE SECTION
• Select and change the tempo of just one section of a song and then loop it to make practise easy
• Add sections of a song to a Setlist multiple times and then play them back at different tempos

APPLE WATCH
• Easily control playback, tempo and volume from your wrist

AIRPLAY
• AirPlay support for output to wireless speakers or Apple TV

AND MORE
• Support for Dark Mode
• Change the key (transpose up or down) of locally stored DRM-free songs imported into the app or from your Music app.  (Missing the pitch controls from the last version? Re-enable them in the Settings app > Perfect Tempo. Then swipe left on the album artwork when playing a song)


IMPORTANT!

* Songs from streaming services other than Apple Music are not supported *

pt.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

pt.description:
Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication

Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface.

IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ

Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it.

Choosing the Best Softphone App

Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience.

Key Features of the SIP Softphone
- Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729.
- HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8.
- Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption.
- Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain.
- Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls.
- Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones.
- 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems.

Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. 

More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer

Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It’s a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication.

Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

pt.description:
Make voice and video calls, send messages, and stay connected with Acrobits Softphone App — a powerful and feature-rich SIP softphone designed for all your calling needs.

IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ

Acrobits Softphone is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. To use it, you need an account with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports standard SIP clients. 

Note: this app does not support call transfer or conference calling.

Take your VoIP calling experience to the next level with Acrobits Softphone with out-of-the-box support for many of the most popular providers and Bluetooth devices on the market.

Acrobits Softphone brings all the popular features you expect from a SIP app, including support for 5G, voice and video calling, push notifications, call handover between WiFi and data, multi-device compatibility, lifetime access to support and updates, and more.

Experience crystal clear calling with support for popular audio standards, including Opus, G.722, G.729, G.711, iLBC, and GSM. Need to make video calls? Acrobits Softphone supports up to 720p HD and supports both H.265 and VP8.

You can even create your own look and feel. Acrobits Softphone is fully customizable, allowing you to configure your own SIP call settings, UI, ringtones, and more.

Acrobits Softphone makes it easy for you to communicate with friends and family on any device. This SIP calling app is compatible with virtually all iPhones and iPads.

Don’t worry about hidden fees. You can try Acrobits Softphone today for a one-time fee that comes with lifetime support and updates.

pt.description:
MagicKit AI – Kit de Ferramentas Tudo-em-Um para o Seu Dispositivo

O MagicKit AI é um aplicativo utilitário completo, projetado para ajudá-lo a monitorar seu dispositivo, otimizar o desempenho e acessar ferramentas do dia a dia em uma interface prática. Desenvolvido especialmente para iOS, o MagicKit AI reúne funcionalidades essenciais enquanto protege sua privacidade e economiza bateria.

Ferramentas do Dispositivo e do Sistema
	•	Status da Bateria: Veja o nível de carga e o estado atual da bateria
	•	Uso de Armazenamento: Analise o espaço usado e disponível
	•	Informações do Dispositivo: Verifique detalhes do hardware e do sistema
	•	Tempo de Atividade: Monitore há quanto tempo o dispositivo está ligado
	•	Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos úteis para melhorar o uso da bateria
	•	Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes
	•	Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas
	•	Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da memória e otimize o desempenho
	•	Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, memória e rede

Ferramentas de Rede
	•	Teste de Velocidade: Meça a velocidade da conexão com a internet
	•	Informações do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conexão
	•	Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocalização de endereços IP públicos
	•	Informações de Localização: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, direção e altitude

Segurança e Privacidade
	•	Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com opções personalizáveis
	•	Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memoráveis e seguras
	•	Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores únicos em vários formatos
	•	Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere códigos PIN seguros com várias opções
	•	E-mail Temporário: Crie e-mails descartáveis para proteger sua privacidade

Ferramentas Utilitárias
	•	Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida
	•	Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de câmbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas
	•	Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferenças entre datas com suporte para dias úteis
	•	Conversor de Fuso Horário: Converta horários com atualizações ao vivo e suporte a horário de verão
	•	Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes
	•	Contador Mágico: Acompanhe múltiplos contadores com estatísticas e sequências
	•	Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie códigos QR instantaneamente
	•	Scanner de Documentos e Cartões: Capture e salve digitalizações com reconhecimento de texto via IA
	•	Bússola e Nível: Meça direção e nível usando os sensores do dispositivo
	•	Travar Orientação: Trave a orientação da tela ao usar o app
	•	Medidor de Áudio: Meça níveis de som ao redor com o microfone
	•	Gerenciador de Área de Transferência: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sessão
	•	Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela
	•	Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud
	•	Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleatórios como texto, números, datas e mais

Destaques
	•	Interface limpa e fácil de usar com ferramentas assistidas
	•	Seção de Ferramentas em Destaque com as mais populares
	•	Sem anúncios ou compras no aplicativo
	•	Leve e eficiente no uso de bateria
	•	Compatível com todos os dispositivos iOS
	•	Atualizações frequentes com novas ferramentas
	•	Desenvolvido com foco em privacidade e desempenho
	•	Suporte para tema claro/escuro com animações suaves

Perfeito para:
	•	Monitorar e otimizar o dispositivo
	•	Medições e conversões do dia a dia
	•	Escanear documentos e QR Codes
	•	Limpar fotos e contatos duplicados
	•	Criar lembretes e contagens regressivas
	•	Acompanhar hábitos e progresso
	•	Acessar ferramentas rápidas como lanterna e brilho
	•	Diagnósticos básicos de rede
	•	Criar senhas seguras e manter a privacidade
	•	Tomar notas rápidas e organizadas

Baixe o MagicKit AI hoje mesmo e simplifique suas tarefas diárias com um kit inteligente e poderoso.
